name: desktime-hack
description: Its a hacking tool for desktime active time tracking app

desktime-hack.keyboard.text.randomGenera.description: Specifies the option to invoke a API to get random text to type in a file. If URL return an object then specifiy the target property with `@`symbol at the end of the url. Example `http://test.com//api@target.prop`

desktime-hack.keyboard.keyStrokeDelay.description: Controls the delay in minute after every key press.

desktime-hack.mouse.active.description: Controls the behavious of moving mouse over active window.

desktime-hack.mouse.movement.description: Controls the behaviour of the number of pixels someone want to move on every operation.

desktime-hack.files.switchBetweenRandomA.description: Specifies the option to switch back and forth between generating files randomly or traverse available files.

desktime-hack.files.onlyRandom.description: Specifies the option to traverse only random generated files. Only works if `#desktime-hack.files.switchBetweenRandomAndAllExisting#` is truned off.

desktime-hack.files.onlyExisting.description: Specifies the option to traverse only available files in the current workspace folder. Only works if `#desktime-hack.files.switchBetweenRandomAndAllExisting#` is truned off.

desktime-hack.files.traverseDelay.description: Controls the delay in minute after which the current action will be recycled.

desktime-hack.files.filter.fileTypes.description: Specifies the option to filter certain file types.

desktime-hack.files.filter.excludeFolder.description: Specifies the option to filter certain folder on which the action will not perform. The path should be a absulate or raltive path related to the current workspace.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
